item.title: Exploring the "Great Debate" in the PowerShell Community
item.description: Exploring the “Great Debate” in the PowerShell Community Introduction The PowerShell community has long been engaged in a series of debates around best practices, coding styles, and various aspects of PowerShell scripting. These discussions, collectively referred to as the “Great Debate
